Class PlayerController

java.lang.Object
Controller.PlayerController
public class PlayerController extends Object
The PlayerController class manages player actions such as assigning countries, distributing armies, and creating orders.

      p_Player - The player.
      Returns:

    • assignArmies

      public void assignArmies(CurrentState p_CurrentState)
      Assigns armies to players based on the number of countries they own and continent bonuses.
      Parameters:
      p_CurrentState - The current game state containing players.

    • createDeployOrder

      public void createDeployOrder(String p_OrderName, Player p_Player)
      Creates and validates a deploy order for a player.
      Parameters:
      p_OrderName - The order command.
      p_Player - The player issuing the order.

    • isUnallocatedArmiesExist

      public boolean isUnallocatedArmiesExist(CurrentState p_currentState)
      Checks if any player has unallocated armies.
      Parameters:
      p_currentState - The current game state.
      Returns:
      True if unallocated armies exist, otherwise false.

    • isUnexecutedOrdersExist

      Checks if any unexecuted orders exist for any player.
      Parameters:
      p_currentState - The current game state.
      Returns:
      True if unexecuted orders exist, otherwise false.
